post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Our client, a leader in the food services industry is looking for an Intranet Content Administrator for a 3 month contract. You must have superior communication skills, a good understanding of internet/intranet fundamentals, be able to create hyperlinks, understand web design principles (i.e. good layout, structure), and present web design in a user friendly manner.

We thank all candidates for applying, however, only those candidates who qualify will be contacted. Thank you for your interest.


Additional Information
Salary: CAD 15.00 to CAD 17.00 per year
Position Type: Full Time, Temporary/Contract/Project
Ref Code: INT  

Contact Information
Maria Carchidi
maria.carchidi@adecco.com
Adecco
Fax: 905-474-1860
post.title: Intranet Content Administrator
